Package org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.opt

Class NaiveSimulation

java.lang.Object
org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.opt.AbstractSimulation
org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.opt.NaiveSimulation
All Implemented Interfaces:
Simulation
public class NaiveSimulation
extends AbstractSimulation
This class provides a naive implementation of computing the simulation relations defined in [Fabio Somenzi and Roderick Bloem. Efficient Buchi automata from LTL Formulae. CAV 2000]. It is extended to support automata with labels on transitions and with other types of acceptance conditions, including acceptance conditions on transitions. Note that the alphabet of the input automaton must be non-empty.
Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai
